item.description:
Tickets are now on sale for the Boston Wine Expo-- the largest wine and food event in New England!

The Boston Wine Expo features:

450 Wineries from Around the Globe, 1,800 Wines to Sample
Celebrity Chef Demonstrations, Guided Seminars & Tastings, Grand Cru Wine Lounge
“Meet & Greet” with Winemakers
And lots more!

** If you use the promo code EXTRAS you will receive an additional $20 discount!!! **
** EXTRAS promo code is courtesy of The Boston Globe (it pays to subscribe!) **

** After the EXTRAS discount, Sunday afternoon will cost $65 + $3.50 ticket fee = $68.50 **
** You need to purchase your ticket yourself, from the web-site or at the door on the day **
** Tickets purchased at the door DO NOT QUALIFY FOR THE EXTRAS DISCOUNT = $85/ticket **

For more information and to purchase your ticket, go to Boston Wine Expo!

NOTE: The Expo runs Friday night, Saturday afternoon & Sunday afternoon. This Meetup get-together is for the SUNDAY afternoon.


For detailed info re: wineries exhibiting see:
http://www.wine-expos...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the bar @ The Seaport Hotel @ 1PM if you can't make it for brunch in JP beforehand. Those interested in brunch - we're looking to meet @ Sorella's around 10.30am
item.name: Boston Wine Expo 2011!!
